description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character successfully Evades three consecutive attacks without being struck whilst on a mission. When Character makes a successful Evasion Test against an attack, they impose -10 to Ballistic and Weapon Skill Attacks to hit them until the start of their next turn.
